info.author: Bexudis Stavros
info.description:
=========
Pyautosub
=========
-----------------------
why this doesnt show up
-----------------------

Installation:
=============

.. code::

    pip install pyautosub

Examples:
=========

.. code:: python

    from pyautosub import SubtitleFile
   
    filename = r'C:\test\bos.srt'
    s = SubtitleFile()
    s.open_subtitle_file(filename)
    s.print_list()

    filename = r'C:\codetest\1.srt'
    x = SubtitleFile()
    x.open_subtitle_file(filename)
    x.resync(-5.701)
    x.save_as(r'C:\codetest\1 (1).srt')

    filename = r'C:\codetest\2.srt'
    x = SubtitleFile()
    x.open_subtitle_file(filename)
    x2y = [(9.919, 10.919),
           (1611.756, 1614.256), #00:26:51,756 --> (+2.5)
           (2335.828, 2339.828)] #00:38:55,828 --> (+4)
    x.linear_transformation(x2y, True, True)
    x.save_as(r'C:\codetest\2 (1).srt')


Supported Types:
================

- Read: SubRip(.srt), MicroDVD(.sub)
- Write: SubRip(.srt)
info.keywords: sub subs subtitle subtitles sub srt
info.name: pyautosub
